Earn Rewards For Scanning Your Groceries!
screens.html: Scan your groceries and be rewarded with gift cards, sweepstakes entries and more! Each week you participate, you earn reward points redeemable for a wide variety of gift cards. You'll also receive additional rewards and incentives for taking part in surveys and special programs. The more you participate the more you earn!
